snippet.title: "It's Over Honey" Zack Snyder Speaks On Firing Amber Heard From Aquaman 2
snippet.description:
Zack Snyder Speaks On Amber Heard And If She Will Continue In The Movie Aquaman 2 Or If She's Fired FOr Good

✅ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

It seems like fans had completely forgotten about Aquaman and the controversy surrounding Amber Heard because for months no one said a thing on social media, the news, or any other media source. However, after the title of the movie was released, the internet exploded again with people from all backgrounds slamming Amber Heard for everything she has done. 

News got out of the sequel’s title, the hashtags “Boycott Aquaman 2” and “justice for Johnny Depp” became hot topics on twitter with fans expressing their disappointment and claiming how they would not even watch the movie if Heard was involved in it. But what is going to happen, will Zack Snyder actually fire Amber Heard after all the social media backlash she has been getting? Also this time fans are actually targeting the movie and not just Amber herself, so will he take the hard decision and remove her completely?

#AmberHeard #ZackSnyder #JohnnyDepp
